data.title: The Rise and Fall of the Greatest Kings of Israel w/ Dr. Italy
data.meta_description: Dr. Marcellino D’Ambrosio engages with Jeff Cavins in a detailed exploration of the lives of King Saul, King David, and King Solomon.
data.text:
King Saul, King David, and King Solomon were among the earliest and possibly the most influential monarchs of Israel. What qualities distinguished them as remarkable rulers, and where did they encounter challenges and setbacks? Dr. Marcellino D’Ambrosio (Dr. Italy) engages with Jeff Cavins in a detailed exploration of the lives of these three kings. They delve into their triumphs and downfalls, giving you a deeper understanding of these historical figures. Join this enlightening conversation to gain a more comprehensive insight into the lives of these three iconic kings.

Dr. Marcellino D’Ambrosio (“Dr. Italy”) received his Ph.D. in historical theology from The Catholic University of America under the direction of Avery Cardinal Dulles and has had a prolific career as a Catholic author, internationally-respected speaker, pilgrimage leader, and university professor. He is the Co-founder and Director of The Crossroads Initiative, the author of five books and hundreds of articles, and a regular guest on both secular and Catholic TV and radio programs. Dr. D’Ambrosio is currently a Professor of Theology at the Catholic Distance University. He and his wife Susan reside in Dallas, Texas.

Thank You to Our Sponsor
